text:
Quma | Berlin | Full-time/Part-Time/Internships | Engineers/Marketers/DevOps/Sales

Quma is looking for more people to support it's goal. We are looking for Engineers with knowledge in ChatBots and/or ML. DevOps to assist with the deployment and reliability of the systems. Marketers / Sales to enhance our product to market approach.

Tech we use: .Net Core 2.1 / MSSQL / DigitalOcean / CircleCI

Just send us an email or check out the positions on https://www.quma.io/about
